title: FairSplit
summary: Group Expense Management App with Receipt Scanning
description: • Developed a React Native app for logging and managing group expenses. It's like Splitwise but has a more intuitive UI for sharing expenses on an itemized receipt (e.g. sharing the expense for the same item).
• Developed a Django backend for auth, contacts, and expense API endpoints.

• Integrated an OCR model for scanning that extracts merchant, timestamp, totals, and itemized expenses from receipts into a PostgreSQL database. Created features to assign expense items to other contacts.
• Configured AWS S3 to store receipts after being parsed for data.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe Multiplayer
summary: Mobile Multiplayer Game with a Configurable AI Bot
description: •Developed a realtime React Native multiplayer tic-tac-toe game where users can play with other users and an AI.
•Developed a matchmaking algorithm which allows a user to play with random users, or in a preconfigured game lobby. Used Google Firestore to keep track of active game lobbies.
•Implemented the AI using a heuristic that supports adjustable difficulty across all board sizes without making the AI unbeatable, ensuring balanced gameplay.
•Designed a 3D-inspired UI with interactive sound effects to enhance gameplay appeal.

title: Todo List Full-Stack App
summary: Full-stack Todo List application featuring task and list management, collaborator invites, and real-time progress tracking
description: • A full-stack Todo List application featuring task and list management, collaborator invites, and real-time progress tracking, powered by Next.js, Flask, and SQLite.
• Developed a Next.js frontend with React, Flask backend, and SQLite database for task and list management.
• Implemented real-time progress tracking and collaborator invites using WebSocket and REST API.
• Designed a responsive UI with Tailwind CSS for a seamless user experience.

title: Rollin in Dough eCommerce
summary: Bakery eCommerce with smart carts, payments, and CI/CD workflows
description: • Developed a React frontend with Next.js, Firebase Auth, and Firestore for cart management and checkout.
• Integrated Square payment API for secure transactions and token-verified middleware for backend security.
• Implemented CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.
